title: On solder
brief_description: Presents the latest soldering techniques used in the electronics industry. Uses close-up photography to reveal the physical and chemical actions that occur in soldering. Shows the difference between perfect and imperfect solder points and demonstrates the detrimental effect of a poor joint on the efficiency of the electronic circuit.
